_sText:
Bhop_tut_v2

Well i made a version 2 of this map, cuz i thought it would be fun to have a map where you have to complete a lvl to get to a new one, so thats what you do in the V2. Ive added a little bit more to the last step on this one..



bhop_tut

Well i made this map, cuz a m8 asked me to make a map, thats on a noobs lvl... He cant bhop and wants to learn it... Ive tryed to make a map thats for beginners.. But at the same time they will get some great tasks for beginners i think.. 

Anyway i dont know if this will help anyone to learn bhop, but the map is actually alright. im considering making a edition with no option to chose between steps... but i dont know... 

This map is not based on detailed textured as you probably noticed... But still i think my textures are better than those Orange/Grey you see allround (i guess its from bhop_banana... idk)

Well have fun with my map...
